aria-label.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the toggle. Useful for composition.

onChange.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.

pressed.description: Whether the toggle is initially pressed.
